abstract: Letter from Kathleen Sebelius, secretary of health and human services, and Arne Duncan, secretary of education, responds to Oct 20 Nicholas D Kristoff Op-Ed column on early education programs.
snippet: The secretaries of health and human services and education make the case for high-quality early childhood programs.
lead_paragraph: The secretaries of health and human services and education make the case for high-quality early childhood programs.

headline.seo: From 2 Cabinet Secretaries: Support for Early Education
